summary: A simple player home in-between Riverwood and Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]New In Version 2.1[/color]

[color=#f4f4f4]Mostly a bug fix for one of the banners I managed to flip upside down, as-well as adding a wood chopping block and
[/color]a chair outside. A couple of extra axes can be found within the house's crafting area under the table with the maps,
and armour.

[color=#ffff00]New in Version 2.0[/color]

I've finally got around to re-visiting the mod, and upgrading things that I personally thought were lacking.
[color=yellow]As of now the all the screenshots displayed are out-dated[/color], as I've done a huge overhaul within the crafting
area, as-well as minor tweaks to the dining/cooking area upstairs, as-well as the bedroom. The bathing
area has now been redone as-well, and outside a small amount of shrubbery was added as-well as a map
marker.

Along with all this I'm now using some custom assets provided by InsanitySorrow (Bath towels, Paintings, and Soap)
These assets can be found at: http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/topic/4962-list-skyrim-modders-resources/
And of course huge thanks to InsanitySorrow for providing these to the modding community.

[color=red]The mod now also requires the Hearthfire DLC, and will CTD without it.

[/color][color=#00ffff]When upgrading be sure to pick up any items kept within the house, otherwise they may disappear.[/color]

[color=#ffff00]Version 2.01 and above Cleaned with TES5EDIT[/color]

[color=#00ffff]___________________________________________________________[/color]
[color=yellow]
Version 1.0 Description[/color]

Just a simple home that I made for myself and decided to share.

[color=red]Requires Skyrim 1.9, Dawnguard, and Dragonborn.[/color]
author: bG_Roman
